abstract: It is well known that bacteria often acquire drug resistance genes through acquiring exogenous resistant plasmids. The  Three sequence type (ST) 17  Strain HD9931 was tigecycline-sensitive, whereas HD9932 and HD10868 were tigecycline-resistant because of the presence of a  Our study highlights the complexity of resistance gene transfer and underscores the need for continued vigilance and research in this field.
